description: This Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) is the first two phases of the Cyber Security Procurement Vehicle (CSPV). Four supplier groups that have previously participated in the qualification process are eligible to participate. The ITQ is for the purpose of qualification only, with no purchase of goods or services required.
duration_in_months: When necessary, the proponent's proposal for the award will be added to the Contract Record and period value only updated with the price of the selected/largset tolerated priced fined/estimated by the CSProgrammatically managed and converted by IT quarters
full_summary:
# Invitation to Qualify for the Cyber Security Procurement Vehicle

## Tender Information

* **Tender Reference:** SSC-23-00021309:T
* **Tender Amendment:** Amendment 2
* **Tender Number:** BPM006672/21309
* **Publication Date:** January 2, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 26, 2023, at 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
* **Expected Contract End Date:** None

## Tender Status

* **Tender Status:** Expiring

## Tender Description

Shared Services Canada invites suppliers to participate in the ongoing qualification process for the Cyber Security Procurement Vehicle (CSPV). This invitation to qualify (ITQ) is the first step of the agile procurement process started by Shared Services Canada in 2019. The goal of this process is to ensure that only qualified respondents are authorized to bid on subsequent solicitations issued under the CSPV.

## Important Notes

* This ITQ is not a solicitation of bids or tenders. No contract will be awarded as a result of the activities during the ITQ phase of the CSPV.
* Suppliers who have already submitted a response to one of the previous 4 waves for qualification do not need to submit again.
* A response to this solicitation requires data to be input into a pricing table. Please enter $0.00 when prompted at submission.

## Registering for the Tender

* To access this ITQ, please connect to the SSC P2P Portal application by clicking on the following link: [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_public](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_public)
* Use the following information to search for the ITQ:
	+ RFx name: Invitation to Qualify for the Cyber Security Procurement Vehicle
	+ Closing date: May 26, 2023, 14:00:00
* To register, please go to [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca) and click "Register Now".

## Contact Information

* Contact Name: Vanessa Woodend
* Contact Email: [vanessa.woodend@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:vanessa.woodend@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* Contact Phone
